trans-unit.source: Encapsulates an input event when it is being processed by the input manager.
trans-unit.target: 封裝時輸入管理員正在處理的輸入的事件。

trans-unit.source: The StagingAreaInputItem class provides a dictionary-based storage of the listeners of the input manager events.
trans-unit.target: StagingAreaInputItem 類別提供的輸入的管理員事件接聽程式的字典為基礎儲存體。

trans-unit.source: The input staging area processes raw input into [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的臨時區域處理未經處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the input data associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定索引鍵相關聯的輸入的資料。

trans-unit.source: An arbitrary key for the data.
This cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The data for this key, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此機碼中的資料或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the input event data associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StagingAreaInputItem"></xref> object
trans-unit.target: 取得與此相關聯的輸入的事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StagingAreaInputItem"></xref>物件

trans-unit.source: Creates a dictionary entry by using the specified key and the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的索引鍵和指定的資料，以建立字典項目。

trans-unit.source: This data is used during the processing of this input event.
trans-unit.target: 在此輸入事件的處理，會使用這項資料。

trans-unit.source: An arbitrary key for the data.
This cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The data to set for this key.
trans-unit.target: 要設定此索引鍵的資料。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
